name: gsheets-crud
description: A TypeScript library for performing CRUD operations on Google Sheets via the Google Sheets API. Ideal for Node.js applications requiring spreadsheet automation and API integration.

scripts.build: bun build ./gsheetsCrud.ts --target bun --outdir dist --format esm --external googleapis --minify && tsc

author: Ruslan Mayer https://github.com/rstupa
